sentences.en: Don't fiddle with the rifle bolt.

sentences.cn: 不要摆弄那架打字机了.

sentences.en: fiddled away the morning with unnecessary tasks.
sentences.cn: 一早上的时间都浪费在不必要的工作上了

sentences.en: Hardy as a young man played the fiddle at local dances.
sentences.cn: 哈迪年轻时在当地舞会上演奏小提琴。

sentences.en: Hardy played the fiddle at local dances.
sentences.cn: 哈迪在当地的舞会上拉了小提琴。

sentences.en: He brought out the fiddle, its varnish cracked and blistered.
sentences.cn: 他取出了小提琴，它表面的清漆已出现裂缝，还起了浮泡。

sentences.en: He heard the sound of the fiddle on the village green.
sentences.cn: 他听见了村里草地上的提琴声.

sentences.en: He was fit as a fiddle when he came back from abroad.
sentences.cn: 他从国外回来时身体很好.

sentences.en: I felt as fit as a fiddle after a hot bath.
sentences.cn: 洗完热水澡感到全身舒畅.

sentences.en: I found out how to fix the tray on — a bit of a fiddle.
sentences.cn: 我知道该怎么把这盘子固定住了——有点麻烦。

sentences.en: I'm as fit as a fiddle — with energy to spare.
Police investigating a £10 million car insurance fiddle arrested 16 people yesterday.
sentences.cn: 调查涉及1,000万英镑的汽车保险诈骗案的警察昨天逮捕了16人。

sentences.en: she had to play second fiddle to the interests of her husband.
sentences.cn: 她不得不迁就她丈夫的喜好。

sentences.en: She hated the thought of playing second fiddle to Rose.
sentences.cn: 想到要身居罗斯之下她就很郁闷。

sentences.en: To by refused to play second fiddle to young Simpson.
sentences.cn: 托比拒绝当小辛普森的副手.

sentences.en: Two of them got out to fiddle around with the engine.
sentences.cn: 其中两人下车鼓捣引擎。

words.tran_cn: 无用的；无足轻重的；微不足道的（等于fiddly）
拉提琴的人；小提琴手；骗子；游荡者
拉小提琴；虚度时光（fiddle的ing形式）

phrases.tran_cn: 摆弄；乱动；玩弄；弄虚作假
二流的人；交响乐队中第二小提琴部

trans.tran_cn: 小提琴，[航]桌面柜，〈非〉胡扯，无聊，欺诈，欺骗行为
拉小提琴，神经质地摆弄手指或手，瞎搞，胡混，干预，篡改
用提琴演奏（乐曲），欺诈，欺骗，伪造
